00040 #ifndef RAY_H
00041 #define RAY_H
00042 
00043 #include <iostream>
00044 #include "tgc.h"
00045 #include "Point3D.h"
00046 #include "Vector3D.h"
00047 
00048 struct Ray
00049 {
00050     Ray( );
00051     Ray( const Point3D& orig, const Vector3D& direc, double start = tgc::Epsilon, double end = tgc::Infinity );
00052     ~Ray( );
00053     Point3D operator()( double t ) const;
00054     bool operator==( const Ray& ray ) const;
00055         
00056     Point3D origin;
00057     Vector3D direction;
00058     mutable double mint;
00059     mutable double maxt;
00060 };
00061 
00062 std::ostream& operator<<( std::ostream& os, const Ray& ray );
00063 
00064 #endif
